trams.description: Set of trams ordered by increasing arrival time

FormattedDepartureBoardServices.description: Stores services by destination, ordered by ascending wait time.

destinations.description: Dict between destination and a sorted set of trams for that dest

FormattedServices.description: Stores services by destination, ordered by ascending wait time.

routesFromOrigin.description:
Routes taken from the origin destination
to either the interchange stop or destination
stop if no interchange is required
(Only require a single route).

stopsFromOrigin.description: Stops between the origin stop and interchange or destination for each route.

terminiFromOrigin.description:
Maps the route name to the destination of the Tram to the Interchange Stop or the Destination Stop
E.g.Green line towards Bury (With the Stop value for Bury)

routesFromInterchange.description:
Route from the Interchange stop to the
destination stop. This may be null.

stopsFromInterchange.description: Stops between the interchange and destination stop.

terminiFromInterchange.description:
Maps the route name to the destination of the Tram from the interchange stop.
E.g.Green line towards Bury (With the Stop value for Bury)

requiresInterchange.description:
Boolean showing if the route requires an
interchange. This can be used as a proxy
to see if the RouteFromInterchange
and InterchangeStop will be null.

routeDetails.description:
Useful information about the route
not covered by the other fields.

minutesFromOrigin.description:
Journey time minutes from the origin stop to
interchange stop or end of journey if no interchange is required.

minutesFromInterchange.description:
Journey time minutes from the interchange stop to the
destination stop. This is 0 if there is no interchange.

totalJourneyTimeMinutes.description:
Total journey time from origin to destination in minutes.
If there is no interchange, this will be the same as the
MinutesFromOrigin

PlannedJourney.description: POCO object that details a planned route between an origin and destination stop.

colour.description: Hex colour string for the route, e.g. #7B2082

stops.description: Stops belonging to a route in the order they can be travelled between.

Route.description:
Class that represents a tram route between two Stops.
The stops are included as the Stop class, so all relevant information is available.

stopName.description: Name of the stop, such as Piccadilly

tlaref.description: 3 code ID for the stop, e.g. PIC for Piccadilly

ids.description: IDs associated with the stop. Larger stops will have more IDs.

atcoCode.description:
Naptan ID for the stop. This can be used to look up more information
in government transport data sets

latitude.description: Stop Latitude. This may be different to that shown by apple or google maps.

longitude.description: Stop Longitude. This may be different to that shown by apple or google maps.

street.description:
Street the stop is on. If it is not directly on a street, it will be prefixed
with 'Off'.

roadCrossing.description:
Closest road intersection to the stop. For stops where there is not a close intersection,
this will be blank.

line.description:
Line the stop is on. This is a single value and does not contain all lines.
This will be a destination, such as Bury, and does not include the line colour(s).

stopZone.description:
Ticket fare zone for the stop. If a stop is in multiple zones, it will
be shown as 'a/b', where a is the smaller of the two zones, e.g. '3/4'.

Stop.description: Stores information about a single stop.

destination.description: Destination for the tram, e.g. Piccadilly.

carriages.description: Number of carriages the tram has, either 'Single' or 'Double'

wait.description:
Wait for the tram, an int of mins.
This is stored as a string as this is the format returned by the TfGM API.
It is not converted as no calculations are completed using it.

Tram.description: Stores service information about a single tram.
